DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Choose an Attack from hand. Exhaust it if playable, otherwise use it and put on the bottom of draw pile.
Unplayable Retain attack that should be thrown to make effect.
Can't be played if there is no disk in your hand.
When owner gains Block, if Block amount is less or equal Bug, it takes damage equal to Bug and decreases Bug by 2.
When you gain Parkour, EVRYONE gain #bBlock next turn equal to Parkour. At the end of your turn reduce Parkour by half..
Upon receiving attack damage, gains block equal to #yMalleable and increase it's amount by 1 this turn.
